languages.text: "Чем глубже познаю твой вид, тем чаще задаюсь вопросом: как вы заселили столько миров? Как в принципе смогли достичь звезд?"
"The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"
languages.original_text: "Чем глубже познаю твой вид, тем чаще задаюсь вопросом: как вы заселили столько миров? Как в принципе смогли достичь звезд?"

traits.locale_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"
"The deeper my knowledge of your species, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"
"The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"
"The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"
"The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"
"The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

languages.text: «Cuanto más se amplía mi conocimiento de vuestra especie, más me pregunto cómo es posible que hayáis colonizado tantos mundos. ¿Cómo llegasteis siquiera a las estrellas?».
languages.original_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuanto más se amplía mi conocimiento de vuestra especie, más me pregunto cómo es posible que hayáis colonizado tantos mundos. ¿Cómo llegasteis siquiera a las estrellas?».

languages.text: “我越是了解你们的种族，就越是不断扪心自问：你们究竟是怎么殖民这么多世界的？你们当初究竟是怎么飞向群星的？”
languages.original_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

traits.locale_text: “我越是了解你们的种族，就越是不断扪心自问：你们究竟是怎么殖民这么多世界的？你们当初究竟是怎么飞向群星的？”

languages.text: 「お前の種族について詳しくなればなるほど、自問することになる。どれほど多くの惑星を植民地化したのか？手始めにどうやって星に接近したのか？」
languages.original_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の種族について詳しくなればなるほど、自問することになる。どれほど多くの惑星を植民地化したのか？手始めにどうやって星に接近したのか？」

languages.text: « Mieux j'apprends à connaître votre espèce, plus je me demande comment vous vous êtes débrouillés pour coloniser autant de mondes... Et pour commencer, par quel miracle avez-vous réussi à vous hisser jusqu'aux étoiles ? »
languages.original_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

traits.locale_text: « Mieux j'apprends à connaître votre espèce, plus je me demande comment vous vous êtes débrouillés pour coloniser autant de mondes... Et pour commencer, par quel miracle avez-vous réussi à vous hisser jusqu'aux étoiles ? »

languages.text: "Türünüz hakkındaki bilgi birikimim arttıkça kendime daha sık soruyorum... Bu kadar çok dünyayı nasıl kolonileştirdiniz? Yıldızlara ilk başta nasıl ulaştınız?"
languages.original_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

traits.locale_text: "Türünüz hakkındaki bilgi birikimim arttıkça kendime daha sık soruyorum... Bu kadar çok dünyayı nasıl kolonileştirdiniz? Yıldızlara ilk başta nasıl ulaştınız?"

languages.text: "Je umfassender mein Wissen über Eure Spezies wird, desto öfter frage ich mich: Habt Ihr zu viele Welten kolonialisiert? Wie habt Ihr überhaupt die Sterne erreicht?"
languages.original_text: "The deeper my knowledge of your species becomes, the more often I ask myself: how have you colonised so many worlds? How did you reach the stars to begin with?"

traits.locale_text: "Je umfassender mein Wissen über Eure Spezies wird, desto öfter frage ich mich: Habt Ihr zu viele Welten kolonialisiert? Wie habt Ihr überhaupt die Sterne erreicht?"
